participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: motivated and resilient, but sometimes feels overwhelmed by life's challenges.
participant_1.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: curious and empathetic, always eager to make friends but struggles with social connections.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i don't have many friends. i hate school. i love to play pobox.
